definition: to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Guiyang is on a tributary of the Wu River in the center of the Guizhou province.
sentences.chinese: 贵阳位于乌江支流上，居贵州省的正中央。

sentences.english: The Taoist aesthetic is the most important subsidiary current in Chinese traditional aesthetic cultural river system.
sentences.chinese: 道教审美文化是中国传统审美文化河系的重要支流。

sentences.english: Thailand's northern rivers, the largest ACMECS upstream tributaries.
sentences.chinese: 泰国北部河流，湄南河上游最大支流。

sentences.english: On this tumultuous descent, streams merge and tributaries unite.
sentences.chinese: 喧嚣下，百川并纳，支流汇合。

sentences.english: The Kashi River is one the Ili's three major tributaries.
sentences.chinese: 喀什河是伊犁河的三大支流之一。

sentences.english: The north of the province is drained by tributaries of the Hai River, such as Sanggan and Hutuo rivers.
sentences.chinese: 山西北部由海河的支流流过，例如桑干河和滹沱河。

sentences.english: This is a tributary of Zhujiang River.
Ane they tumble from this higher land to meet the Ganges on the plains.
sentences.chinese: 支流从高地往下流，与平原上的恒河汇合。

sentences.english: Constructing tributary-control projects and expanding the flood-discharge capacity of the lower- middle streams of major rivers.
sentences.chinese: 建设干支流控制工程，扩大中下游行洪能力。

sentences.english: The river divides here into two branches.
sentences.chinese: 这条河从这儿分成两条支流。

sentences.english: At last they turned off the big river into a little side river that came down to join it.
sentences.chinese: 最后他们划离主河道转入一条与大河交汇的小支流。

sentences.english: It is the Tekes River, one of three major tributaries of the Ili River.
sentences.chinese: 特克斯河啊，这是伊犁河的三大支流之一。

sentences.english: A river and its branches (or tributaries) form a river system.
sentences.chinese: 河流与其支流形成河系。

sentences.english: Is a tributary of the Brahmaputra's largest.
sentences.chinese: 是雅鲁藏布江最大的一条支流。

sentences.english: The company dumped to toxic wastes into this canal.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司把有毒废物倾倒入这条支流。

sentences.english: North Stone River tributary of the main shops are Situ River.
sentences.chinese: 北石店河的支流主要是司徒河。

definition: inland river/river draining to inland sea
Irtysh River, flowing from southwest Altai in Xinjiang through Kazakhstan and Siberia to the Arctic Ocean
